channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FAA says it will list airports where it is reducing flights during the government shutdown
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is expected to list where it plans to scale back flights by 10% starting Friday. The agency says it will release details Thursday.

item.title: Officials scour charred site of Kentucky UPS plane crash for victims and answers
The remains and stories of Native American students are being reclaimed from a Pennsylvania cemetery
